channel.title: Crime Factory - free online browser based game
channel.description:
[B]Crime Factory is browser-based role-playing game set in the worlds, where most important things are money, power and fame. [/B] Rob, kill and manage your business in every legal and illegal way possible to become the most feared criminal of this violent reality.
There are [B]15[/B] different skills to train, hundreds of players to compete with , cars to tune and costumize, houses to build, a worldwide market for buying and selling goods and much more.
Upon registering, you are given 120h of VIP (That’s 5 days!).
[B]The game is also available in 14 different languages [/B]
[U]English version of the game: [url=http://playcrime.net]http://playcrime.net[/url][/U]
As a player, you can invite your friends to the game and earn [B]VIP or even credit.[/B]
My referral link: [url=http://playcrime.net?r=004173]http://playcrime.net?r=004173[/url]

item.title: Crime Factory - free online browser based game
item.dc:creator: @MtEden MtEden
item.description:
@MtEden wrote:

Crime Factory is browser-based role-playing game set in the worlds, where most important things are money, power and fame.

Rob, kill and manage your business in every legal and illegal way possible to become the most feared criminal of this violent reality.

There are 15 different skills to train, hundreds of players to compete with , cars to tune and costumize, houses to build, a worldwide market for buying and selling goods and much more.

Upon registering, you are given 120h of VIP (That’s 5 days!).

The game is also available in 14 different languages

English version of the game: http://playcrime.net

As a player, you can invite your friends to the game and earn VIP or even credit.

My referral link: http://playcrime.net?r=004173
